verses.verse: It <S%G4851>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4851>expedient<s%> for <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1211>doubtless<s%> to <S%G2744%G1063>glory<s%>. I will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3701>visions<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G602>revelations<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

I <S%G1492>knew<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G4253>above<s%> <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G4253>ago<s%>, <S%G1535>(whether<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%>, I <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1492>tell<s%>; or <S%G1535>whether<s%> <S%G1622>out<s%> of the <S%G4983>body<s%>, I <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1492>tell<s%>: <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1492>knoweth<s%>;) such an <S%G5108>one<s%> caught <S%G726>up<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G1535>(whether<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%>, <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1622>out<s%> of the <S%G4983>body<s%>, I <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1492>tell<s%>: <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1492>knoweth<s%>;)

How <S%G3754>that<s%> he was caught <S%G726>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3857>paradise<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G731>unspeakable<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> it <S%G1832>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for a <S%G444>man<s%> to <S%G2980>utter<s%>.

<S%G5228>Of<s%> such an <S%G5108>one<s%> will I <S%G2744>glory<s%>: <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G5228>of<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> I <S%G2744>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2744>glory<s%>, <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>mine<s%> <S%G769>infirmities<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1437>though<s%> I would <S%G2309>desire<s%> to <S%G2744>glory<s%>, I <S%G2071>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2071>be<s%> a <S%G878>fool<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> I will <S%G2046>say<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> now I <S%G5339>forbear<s%>, <S%G3361>lest<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> should <S%G3049>think<s%> <S%G1519>of<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%> <S%G5228>above<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G991>seeth<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> to be, <S%G2228>or<s%> that he <S%G191>heareth<s%> <S%G5100%G1537>of<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> I should be exalted above <S%G5229>measure<s%> through the <S%G5236>abundance<s%> of the <S%G602>revelations<s%>, there was <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> a <S%G4647>thorn<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, the <S%G32>messenger<s%> of <S%G4566>Satan<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2852>buffet<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>, <S%G3363>lest<s%> I should be exalted above <S%G5229>measure<s%>.
<S%G5228>For<s%> this <S%G5127>thing<s%> I <S%G3870>besought<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5151>thrice<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> it might <S%G868>depart<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2046>said<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G3450>My<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> is <S%G714>sufficient<s%> for <S%G4671>thee<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1411>strength<s%> is made <S%G5048>perfect<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G769>weakness<s%>. Most <S%G2236>gladly<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> will <S%G2744>I<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2744>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G769>infirmities<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> may <S%G1981>rest<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%>.

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> I take <S%G2106>pleasure<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G769>infirmities<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5196>reproaches<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G318>necessities<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1375>persecutions<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4730>distresses<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5547>Christ's<s%> <S%G5228>sake<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> I am <S%G770>weak<s%>, <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> I <S%G1415>strong<s%>.

I am <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G878>fool<s%> in <S%G2744>glorying<s%>; <S%G5210>ye<s%> have <S%G315>compelled<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> to have been <S%G4921>commended<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> in <S%G3762>nothing<s%> am I <S%G5302>behind<s%> the very <S%G3029>chiefest<s%> <S%G652%G5228>apostles<s%>, <S%G1499>though<s%> I <S%G1510>be<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%>.

<S%G3303>Truly<s%> the <S%G4592>signs<s%> of an <S%G652>apostle<s%> were <S%G2716>wrought<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5059>wonders<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> mighty <S%G1411>deeds<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is <S%G2076>it<s%> <S%G3739>wherein<s%> ye were <S%G2274>inferior<s%> <S%G5228>to<s%> <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G1577>churches<s%>, <S%G1508>except<s%> it be <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G846>myself<s%> <S%G2655>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2655>burdensome<s%> to <S%G5216>you<s%>? <S%G5483>forgive<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G93>wrong<s%>.

<S%G2400>Behold<s%>, the third <S%G5154>time<s%> I <S%G2192>am<s%> <S%G2093>ready<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G2655>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G2655>burdensome<s%> to <S%G5216>you<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5216>yours<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to lay <S%G2343>up<s%> for the <S%G1118>parents<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G1118>parents<s%> for the <S%G5043>children<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> will very <S%G2236>gladly<s%> <S%G1159>spend<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G1550>spent<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5590%G5216>you<s%>; <S%G1499>though<s%> the more <S%G4056>abundantly<s%> I <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, the <S%G2276>less<s%> I be <S%G25>loved<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> be it <S%G2077>so<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2599>did<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2599>burden<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>: <S%G235>nevertheless<s%>, <S%G5225>being<s%> <S%G3835>crafty<s%>, I <S%G2983>caught<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> with <S%G1388>guile<s%>.
Did I make a <S%G4122%G3361>gain<s%> of <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>?

I <S%G3870>desired<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> with him I <S%G4882>sent<s%> a <S%G80>brother<s%>. <S%G4122%G3387>Did<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> make a <S%G4122>gain<s%> of <S%G5209>you<s%>? walked <S%G4043>we<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> in the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%>? walked we <S%G3756>not<s%> in the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2487>steps<s%>?

<S%G3825>Again<s%>, think <S%G1380>ye<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> we excuse <S%G626>ourselves<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>? we <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G2714>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> we do all <S%G3956>things<s%>, dearly <S%G27>beloved<s%>, <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3619>edifying<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G5399>fear<s%>, <S%G3381%G4458>lest<s%>, when I <S%G2064>come<s%>, I <S%G2147>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> such <S%G3634>as<s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%>, and that <S%G2504>I<s%> shall be <S%G2147>found<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> such <S%G3634>as<s%> ye <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>: <S%G3381%G4458>lest<s%> there be <S%G2054>debates<s%>, <S%G2205>envyings<s%>, <S%G2372>wraths<s%>, <S%G2052>strifes<s%>, <S%G2636>backbitings<s%>, <S%G5587>whisperings<s%>, <S%G5450>swellings<s%>, <S%G181>tumults<s%>:

And <S%G3361>lest<s%>, when I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> will <S%G5013>humble<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that I shall <S%G3996>bewail<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> have sinned <S%G4258>already<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3340>have<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3340>repented<s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> the <S%G167>uncleanness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4202>fornication<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G766>lasciviousness<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they have <S%G4238>committed<s%>.
